alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 2:17PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...All islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Saturday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Active trough will continue hold heavy rain and thunderstorms over the islands through Saturday. As the trough weakens on Saturday night, heavy rain moves farther south southeast. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 217 Aoauli Aso Faraile Tesema 16 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O tafega ma lologa e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono faatupulaia. NOFOAGA...All islands of American Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Saturday AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai aualatele ma nofoaga maualalalo. E mafai foi osofia tafega o vaitafe. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o le a faatupulaia ai pea timuga mamafa ma faititili i luga o le atunuu seia oo i le Aso Toona`i. A`o faaitiitia le malosi o uiga louloua o le tau i le po o le Aso Toona`i, o le a faapea foi ona agai atu le tele o timuga mamafa i saute ma saute i sasa`e mai le atunuu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
